alert.note: Alert for Central Brewster County; Pecos (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 2:53PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Pecos and northeastern Brewster Counties through 345 PM CDT... At 253 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 20 miles northeast of Marathon, or 36 miles northwest of Sanderson, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of south central Pecos and northeastern Brewster Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
